text_logic_form: Find the area of the shape.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the area of the shape $ACBD$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AE$ is $12$ units.
The length of the line $CE$ is $17$ units.
The length of the line $DE$ is $17$ units.
The length of the line $BE$ is $12$ units.
Point $E$ lies on the line connecting $A$ and $B$.
Point $E$ also lies on the line connecting $C$ and $D$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $AD$, $BC$, $BD$, and $CD$, forming the shape $ACBD$.
The lines $AE$, $BE$, $CE$, and $DE$ are the lines connecting the vertices of the shape to the point $E$ inside the shape.
